long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a chrome extension application for scraping product information from "coupang.com", which is a Korean online shopping mall. 
In order to log-in and use this application, the user must be registered to the following website: "https://app-global.playauto.io/". 
The application only works properly with "coupang.com" or its sub-pages. The user can choose to scrape either single product or list of all products visible on the page. 
The scraping process takes approximately 4-6 seconds per product, and when the scraping process has been finished, the user can find the scraped products from his/her account registered at the aforementioned website.
